DOC.brief_title: A Study Effect ONO-8539 Oesophageal Pain Hypersensitivity Patients With Non-erosive Reflux Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This Randomised , Double-blind , Placebo-controlled , Two-period Crossover Study Investigate Effect ONO-8539 Oesophageal Pain Hypersensitivity Patients With Non-erosive Reflux Disease
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 1870 year inclusive confirm GERD normal oesophageal mucosa enrol study . Subjects demonstrate moderate intensity heartburn stable dose proton pump inhibitor demonstrate oesophageal hypersensitivity follow distal oesophageal acid perfusion . Subjects exclude motility disorder , able tolerate study procedure GI surgery condition would affect study result . Subjects functional heartburn , acute GI symptom , endoscopic manometric abnormality protocolspecified cardiovascular condition enrol .
